fields.description:
When I required Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.StackPanel in my app.js, the CLI ended up failing with:
{code}
...
[DEBUG] Native wrapper implementation for Windows.UI.Xaml.Input.Pointer unchanged, retaining existing file.
[DEBUG] Generating stubs for: float32
[ERROR] An error occurred during build after 3s 31ms
[ERROR] Something went wrong. No metadata for type: float32
{code}
fields.summary: Windows: Native stub generation fails on 'float32' when requiring StackPanel

comments.body:
Verified using:

Windows 10 Pro
Appc Core: 5.1.0-42
Appc NPM: 4.2.1
Ti SDK: 5.1.0.v2015102819002

When requiring in Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.StackPanel the CLI no longer fails

Closing ticket
